com.billy.android.loading

类 Gloading

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.billy.android.loading.Gloading

  • public class Gloading
extends java.lang.Object
    manage loading status view
    usage:
    //if set true, logs will print into logcat
    Gloading.debug(trueOrFalse);
    //init the default loading status view creator (Gloading.Adapter)
    Gloading.initDefault(adapter);
    //wrap an activity. return the holder
    Holder holder = Gloading.getDefault().wrap(activity);
    //wrap an activity and set retry task. return the holder
    Holder holder = Gloading.getDefault().wrap(activity).withRetry(retryTask);

    holder.showLoading() //show loading status view by holder
    holder.showLoadSuccess() //show load success status view by holder (frequently, hide gloading)
    holder.showFailed() //show load failed status view by holder (frequently, needs retry task)
    holder.showEmpty() //show empty status view by holder. (load completed, but data is empty)
    从以下版本开始:
    19/3/18 17:49

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  Gloading.Adapter
      Provides view to show current loading status
      static class  Gloading.Holder
      Gloading holder
      create by wrap(Activity) or wrap(View)
      the core API for showing all status view

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int STATUS_EMPTY_DATA 
      static int STATUS_LOAD_FAILED 
      static int STATUS_LOAD_SUCCESS 
      static int STATUS_LOADING 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void debug(boolean debug)
      set debug mode or not
      static Gloading from(Gloading.Adapter adapter)
      Create a new Gloading different from the default one
      static Gloading getDefault()
      get default Gloading object for global usage in whole app
      static void initDefault(Gloading.Adapter adapter)
      init the default loading status view creator (Gloading.Adapter)
      Gloading.Holder wrap(android.app.Activity activity)
      Gloading(loading status view) wrap the whole activity wrapper is android.R.id.content
      Gloading.Holder wrap(android.view.View view)
      Gloading(loading status view) wrap the specific view.

    • 方法详细资料

      • debug

        public static void debug(boolean debug)
        set debug mode or not
        参数:
        debug - true:debug mode, false:not debug mode

      • from

        public static Gloading from(Gloading.Adapter adapter)
        Create a new Gloading different from the default one
        参数:
        adapter - another adapter different from the default one
        返回:
        Gloading

      • getDefault

        public static Gloading getDefault()
        get default Gloading object for global usage in whole app
        返回:
        default Gloading object

      • initDefault

        public static void initDefault(Gloading.Adapter adapter)
        init the default loading status view creator (Gloading.Adapter)
        参数:
        adapter - adapter to create all status views

      • wrap

        public Gloading.Holder wrap(android.app.Activity activity)
        Gloading(loading status view) wrap the whole activity wrapper is android.R.id.content
        参数:
        activity - current activity object
        返回:
        holder of Gloading

      • wrap

        public Gloading.Holder wrap(android.view.View view)
        Gloading(loading status view) wrap the specific view.
        参数:
        view - view to be wrapped
        返回:
        Holder
